name: Kapıcı Project
description:
A downloadable game for Windows

KAPICIPROJECT is a 2.5D game which race against time. The purpose is make your best score. 

Game's main character is a janitor. He is an immigrant from poor town. In a country he doesn't know an employer who tries to do the best that he finds to avoid deportation.  He has to make money to live on.

There are some basic tasks to do. As the janitors do, we collect garbage and repair the broken places.

HOW TO PLAY

Move janitor with "W,A,S and D";

Move elevator with "Num2 and Num8";

Add extra floor with "E";

You should take a garbage in front of the doors.

You can carry only 3 garbages.

You have to put garbages to the garbage can.

You can take toolbox and repair broken product.

You earn money for garbages that you collected and repaired.

You can use money for add new floor. 

***This game is created for educational purposes.
